pages.text: The $(l:collecting/altar)Natural Altar$() can be useful for infusing certain items with the power of $(aura), but it can also be used to $(thing)crush$() certain items into different shapes.$(br)This can be achieved by creating the $(item)Crumbling Catalyst$() and placing it on top of any of the four lower $(item)Golden Stone Brick$() blocks around the altar, and then placing the ingredient on the altar as usual.
Creating the $(item)Crumbling Catalyst$() using the $(l:practices/tree_ritual)Ritual of the Forest$().
Harvesting $(item)Sugar$() by removing it from the cane
Making $(item)Blaze Powder$() out of the Nether's materials
